Reviews.Title: Happy with this product.
Reviews.Author: Carole A.
Reviews.Content: This system works great, we are very happy with the night owl but we upgraded the camera recently to a Great Wall for better clarity of our entrance at night.

ProductInfo.Features:
4 Channel smart DVR with pre-installed 500GB hard drive
Free Night Owl Pro software and CMS software for your PC or Mac
Motion activated push notifications and or email alerts
View, playback and configure your system anywhere in the World from your Smartphone or Tablet
